Select the desired options to associate the selected tag to existing communities in the platform:
only to the communities without ANY tag association
to communities without this tag association
Apply tag according to the selected settings

Add multiple tags at once. Every row entered in the text area below represents a different tag. In every row you should enter a generic default text value for the tag, followed by all the translated values of the term separeted by the character #, as shown below:
DefaultText#Italiano#English#Deutsch#Français#Espanõl
EXAMPLE: If you want to add the tag "Community" and want to put the english term as default text value, you have to enter the following string:
Community#Comunità#Gemeinschaft#Community#Comunidad#Communauté
If you want a field to be empty, for example, the german term, which occupies the third placeholder in the string, you have to leave the "#" separator without adding any text: for the system this equals to an empty field.
Community#Comunità##Community#Comunidad#Communauté
Add tags corresponding to the strings entered in the text area.
